title: calling tpl: cannot retrieve Template.Basepath from values inside tpl function

labels.name: bug
labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.

body:
Some commit in main broke `tpl` usage.


```
$ helm repo add grafana https://grafana.github.io/helm-charts
"grafana" has been added to your repositories

$ ~/helm-main/helm template grafana/grafana --debug
install.go:173: [debug] Original chart version: ""
install.go:190: [debug] CHART PATH: /home/foobar/.cache/helm/repository/grafana-6.16.2.tgz


Error: template: grafana/templates/deployment.yaml:36:28: executing "grafana/templates/deployment.yaml" at <include (print $.Template.BasePath "/configmap.yaml") .>: error calling include: template: grafana/templates/configmap.yaml:23:21: executing "grafana/templates/configmap.yaml" at <tpl $elemVal $>: error calling tpl: cannot retrieve Template.Basepath from values inside tpl function: console: "BasePath" is not a value
helm.go:88: [debug] template: grafana/templates/deployment.yaml:36:28: executing "grafana/templates/deployment.yaml" at <include (print $.Template.BasePath "/configmap.yaml") .>: error calling include: template: grafana/templates/configmap.yaml:23:21: executing "grafana/templates/configmap.yaml" at <tpl $elemVal $>: error calling tpl: cannot retrieve Template.Basepath from values inside tpl function: console: "BasePath" is not a value
```

The error comes from: https://github.com/grafana/helm-charts/blob/2d25705d20e439a51b5d7e3363bd79056036f3ea/charts/grafana/templates/configmap.yaml#L23

Works perfectly with 3.6.3.

Output of `helm version`:

- Working: `version.BuildInfo{Version:"v3.6.3", GitCommit:"d506314abfb5d21419df8c7e7e68012379db2354", GitTreeState:"clean", GoVersion:"go1.16.5"}`
- Broken: `version.BuildInfo{Version:"v3.6+unreleased", GitCommit:"dfec34e2dee69521d52d3ae753f8e6830d1cf477", GitTreeState:"clean", GoVersion:"go1.16.4"}`

Output of `kubectl version`:

```
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"20", GitVersion:"v1.20.7", GitCommit:"132a687512d7fb058d0f5890f07d4121b3f0a2e2", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2021-05-12T12:40:09Z", GoVersion:"go1.15.12", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"20", GitVersion:"v1.20.7", GitCommit:"132a687512d7fb058d0f5890f07d4121b3f0a2e2", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2021-05-12T12:32:49Z", GoVersion:"go1.15.12", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```

Some bisection on d506314abfb5d21419df8c7e7e68012379db2354...dfec34e2dee69521d52d3ae753f8e6830d1cf477 needed...
